Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows communication over a distance using sound.
The student can show how the string telephone connects two students to enable communication.
The student can represent the role of materials (like paper cups and string) used to make the device function.
The student can demonstrate, through their drawing, how sound travels along the string from one student to the other.
The student can include details that indicate the device uses sound to communicate.
The student can display understanding that this kind of device enables people to talk over distances.
The student can highlight features of the design that are important for its function, such as the tautness of the string.
